cohort_id.description: The unique identifier of the cohort to which the member belongs

distinct_id.description: The distinct identifier of the cohort member

browser.description: The web browser used by the cohort member

browser_version.description: The version of the web browser used by the cohort member

city.description: The city where the cohort member is located

country_code.description: The country code of the country where the cohort member is located

region.description: The region where the cohort member is located

timezone.description: The timezone of the cohort member

last_seen.description: The date and time when the cohort member was last seen

email.description: The email address of the cohort member

name.description: The name of the cohort member

first_name.description: The first name of the cohort member

last_name.description: The last name of the cohort member

id.description: The unique identifier of the cohort member

unblocked.description: Indicator of whether the cohort member is unblocked
